name: Hoop Up Dunk- basketball Shot
description:
Can’t stay away from your basketball dunk? Here’s an addictive hoop up dunk Ball Shot to fill up your time endlessly.

Your tap screen will give you feelings of being on court with its astounding graphics and sounds. With Dunk Hit-Crazy Ball Shot its time to hit the court without budging from your seat.


• FEATURES

Tap tap basketball bouncy game fun to play
Simple and addictive gameplay
Easy to control bouncy basket ball
Your taps fires the skins to score higher
Score flappy & slam shot repeatedly with speed and accuracy
Every shot and every second counts
Score refills time for next level
Chain of perfect dunks keep you scoring highest per slam shot
